Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

I have added this rule, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.
Thank you for your reply.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194857#issuecomment-2567067888
>When searching directly from the Google widget on the home screen (which opens results in the Google app), the results display sponsored ads at the top. In this case, the word "baton" was searched and these results came up.

As I recall, Google app cannot be filtered like web browsers, so unfortunately it cannot be fixed.
